channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-9721] Hadoop23Shims.setFullFileStatus should check for null
item.description:
2015-02-18 22:46:10,209 INFO org.apache.hadoop.hive.shims.HadoopShimsSecure: Skipping ACL inheritance: File system for path file:/tmp/hive/f1a28dee-70e8-4bc3-bd35-9be13834d1fc/hive_2015-02-18_22-46-10_065_3348083202601156561-1 does not support ACLs but dfs.namenode.acls.enabled is set to true: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: RawLocalFileSystem doesn't support getAclStatus
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: RawLocalFileSystem doesn't support getAclStatus

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: What variable in setFullFileStatus may be null?
aclStatus see getFullFileStatus. That value is null when an exception is thrown.
This issue has been fixed and released as part of the 1.2.0 release. If you find an issue which seems to be related to this one, please create a new jira and link this one with new jira.
